name: Undertale:His Story
description:
**MAY/MAY NOT BE CONTINUED EVER** **WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS SPOILERS CONCERNING THE ORIGINAL GAME !!!**

Play and find the original game here

Undertale is an RPG game, made by Toby Fox, you control a human who falls underground into the world of monsters. Now you must find your way out... or stay trapped forever.

His Story is a game where you control the prince, the prince of the underground, Asriel Dreamurr, you control every choice he makes down to the part where he enters the surface and what happens when he loses his soul.

Will you go genocide or pacifist?

Features:
+Chara Dreamurr in the eyes of Asriel
+What happened between Asgore and Toriel
+New unexplored rooms in the original game!
+More to be added!

Music -- Nahu Pyrope
Programming, Story -- kiite

** This game is under open beta at the moment, you are completely free to beta test it until further releases are made, should you find any bugs please email me at kiitekit@gmail.com thank you. P.S. This game might or may not ever be fully-made, either way, I experienced alot while making this. Thanks <3**
